Next, on your device, enable Bluetooth if it's not already turned on. Navigate through the list of available devices and select your CMF Buds to connect. Follow your device's instructions for initiating the return process after successful pairing.

Be aware that there could be a delay due to compatibility issues between your buds and system during this operation. This can often be resolved by updating both to their latest versions as per manufacturer guidelines.

If you encounter any difficulties or require further assistance with returning your product, feel free to contact our customer service team using the support number provided in your user manual or on our website. Please note that operational constraints due to return date and software issues might limit direct operation of control functions for a brief period following a full charge.
